content.raw:
Here's a patch for the pelvis that still appears fine in gazebo. Does it help your parser?
~~~
diff -r d9183cb065bb ros/atlas_description/meshes/pelvis.dae
--- a/ros/atlas_description/meshes/pelvis.dae	Thu May 16 14:06:25 2013 +0200
+++ b/ros/atlas_description/meshes/pelvis.dae	Thu May 16 14:51:02 2013 -0700
@@ -12,7 +12,7 @@
     <revision></revision>
     <subject></subject>
     <title></title>
-    <unit meter="1.0" name="centimeter"></unit>
+    <unit meter="100.0" name="meter"></unit>
     <up_axis>Z_UP</up_axis>
   </asset>
   <library_images>
diff -r d9183cb065bb ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf
--- a/ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf	Thu May 16 14:06:25 2013 +0200
+++ b/ros/atlas_description/urdf/atlas_simple_shapes.urdf	Thu May 16 14:51:02 2013 -0700
@@ -381,7 +381,7 @@
         <visual>
             <origin xyz="0 0 0" rpy="0 -0 0" />
             <geometry>
-                <mesh filename="package://atlas/meshes/pelvis.dae" scale="100. 100. 100." />
+                <mesh filename="package://atlas/meshes/pelvis.dae" scale="1 1 1" />
             </geometry>
         </visual>
         <collision group="default">
~~~
